title: Flooding causing delays
text:
Flooding causing delays in Fareham Flooding causing delays 
FLOODING is causing major delays on a Hampshire road this afternoon. 
Newgate Lane in Fareham has been cordoned off at the junction with Palmerston Drive because of flooding. 
There are currently 15 minute delays on the B3385 road. Share article 
Traffic is also building in Fareham on the A27 on Eastern Way between the M27 junction 11 and A32 Gosport Road/Quay Street roundabout. 
Commuters should also expect delays on the A32 Fareham and Bridgemary road southbound on Gosport Road and Fareham Road between Quay Street roundabout and Wych Lane.
